Name: Image
Description: Displays an image from file, resource or URI.

Properties.Name: Aspect
Properties.Description: How the image is scaled within its bounds.

Properties.Name: IsOpaque
Properties.Description: Whether the image is fully opaque.

Properties.Name: IsAnimationPlaying
Properties.Description: Whether an animated image is currently playing (e.g., GIF).

Constructors.Description: Creates an Image and sets its source from a file/resource path.
Creates an Image and sets its source from a URI.
